ygData.subject: Re: help me please
ygData.msgSnippet: Now personally, I don t know which way I stand on this particular issue but as far as I know-- it s not because of Auctioning off characters and items online
ygData.messageBody:
Now personally, I don't know which way I stand on
this particular issue but as far as I know-- it's not
because of Auctioning off characters and items online
that has evoked this policy. <br><br>It's b/c of two
fold reasons. 1) It'd be something that could cause
GM's endless work. A lot of ppl want to move servers
every month and it'd generate a LOT of extra work. I
would hazard to guess there's at least a couple hundred
people a month. 2) There would be characters that would
jump from one server to another to twink friends. Ever
hear of anyone complain about such and such a Power
guild ruining a new server? Usually this is the heart
of the argument.<br><br>I have to say, there are
probably even more reasons why this policy is in place. I
agree that it is sometimes unfair-- dependent on RL
situations. However, it's not totally unfair. There are
reasons behind it. And again, as I understand it-- it has
nothing to do with said, "Illegal activitites". It's an
attempt to protect the other players that could be
adversely affected by the addition of a "Power" character.
Particularly if seen as an addition to a "Power Guild".
<br><br>The only recommendation I have is to try to appeal
for an exception. Gluck.<br><br>FatedHue/shooman
out<br><br>PS... Personal note. I have no troubles with that.
Guilds are nice b/c ya'll are friends. Power Guilds are
nice b/c I group a lot and get benefits from them
constantly. But I know a lot of friends whome hate it b/c
there are guilds that just help twink. This creates
characters that don't learn how to actually play the game,
how to group properly, and ends up in a lot of
deaths.<br><br>I don't mind twinking if you know your character.
But learn what to do when and how to group. Make sure
your skills are up. Many examples where characters
hadn't grouped and didn't know the benefits of taunt. Or
how many times have characters not known to attack
the mezzed Enchanters pet. Learn from others of your
class. Learn root vs snare. Etc. LEARN.<br><br>Sorry.
Personal fustrations getting out.<br><br>shooman out
